subject: Move favicons to project root for Vercel static file serving
body:
Vercel only auto-serves files from public/ for framework projects
(Next.js, etc.). For plain serverless projects, static files must
be at the project root. Since the Vercel root directory is set to
api/, move favicon.ico and favicon.png from api/public/ to api/.

https://claude.ai/code/session_017jorRZB6ANxXDQhyH1Xdom
title: Move favicons to project root for Vercel static file serving
